name: Tempeh Tikka Masala with Kale. Vegan Glutenfree
description: This Tempeh Tikka Masala is vegan, has kale, and packs a complex flavor. Tempeh is cooked with Indian spices, then toasted to make tikka then added to Tikka Masala sauce
recipeIngredient: 4 oz Tempeh cut into small cubes (about 3/4 cup (ensure tempeh is gluten-free if necessary))
1/2 teaspoon garam masala or to taste
a generous pinch of asafoetida (hing - optional - omit to make gf)
1/2 cup packed finely chopped Kale leaves  (or greens of choice)
3 tbsp plain unsweetened non dairy yogurt
1/4 cup or more nondairy milk such as almond milk

itemListElement.text: Mix all the ingredients of the marinade and add Tempeh. Let sit for 5 mins (optional)
itemListElement.name: Mix all the ingredients of the marinade and add Tempeh. Let sit for 5 mins (optional)

itemListElement.text: Transfer to a pan and cook the mixture over low-medium heat, partially covered for 15 minutes or until all the liquid is absorbed by the tempeh.
itemListElement.name: Transfer to a pan and cook the mixture over low-medium heat, partially covered for 15 minutes or until all the liquid is absorbed by the tempeh.

itemListElement.text: Once the tempeh is dry, add a teaspoon of oil and toss on medium for 2-3 minutes, until the edges of the tempeh become golden. Take off heat and keep aside.
itemListElement.name: Once the tempeh is dry, add a teaspoon of oil and toss on medium for 2-3 minutes, until the edges of the tempeh become golden. Take off heat and keep aside.

itemListElement.text: Meanwhile, in a deep medium pan, add 2 teaspoons oil and heat over medium.
itemListElement.name: Meanwhile, in a deep medium pan, add 2 teaspoons oil and heat over medium.

itemListElement.text: Add the onion and cook for 7-8 minutes, stirring occasionally till it becomes translucent and golden.
itemListElement.name: Add the onion and cook for 7-8 minutes, stirring occasionally till it becomes translucent and golden.

itemListElement.text: Blend the tomatoes, ginger, garlic and chili into a smooth puree and set aside.
itemListElement.name: Blend the tomatoes, ginger, garlic and chili into a smooth puree and set aside.

itemListElement.text: Add the spices (turmeric, coriander powder, hing, garam masala, paprika and fenugreek leaves) to the onions, and mix well. Add Kale, mix and cook for another minute.
itemListElement.name: Add the spices (turmeric, coriander powder, hing, garam masala, paprika and fenugreek leaves) to the onions, and mix well. Add Kale, mix and cook for another minute.

itemListElement.text: Add the tomato puree to the onion mixture and cook over low-medium heat for 15-20 minutes stirring occasionally, until the mix thickens, comes together and leaves oil on the sides.
itemListElement.name: Add the tomato puree to the onion mixture and cook over low-medium heat for 15-20 minutes stirring occasionally, until the mix thickens, comes together and leaves oil on the sides.

itemListElement.text: Add the crisp tempeh, and non dairy yogurt, salt and sugar and mix well.Taste and adjust spices, salt.
itemListElement.name: Add the crisp tempeh, and non dairy yogurt, salt and sugar and mix well.Taste and adjust spices, salt.

itemListElement.text: Add almond milk to get the curry consistency you like. Mix well and bring to a boil on low medium heat.
itemListElement.name: Add almond milk to get the curry consistency you like. Mix well and bring to a boil on low medium heat.

itemListElement.text: Take off heat, serve hot topped with fresh chopped cilantro, with Indian flat breads (Roti/Naan) or Basmati rice.
itemListElement.name: Take off heat, serve hot topped with fresh chopped cilantro, with Indian flat breads (Roti/Naan) or Basmati rice.

keywords: vegan tikka masala, vegan tikka masala sauce
